notesStmt.note: Title supplied by Justin McDaniel (viewed on September 30, 2015)
Written on khoi paper; manuscript originally folded concertina- or accordion-style, but this fragment of one folio is stored flat.
Written and painted in central Siam in the late 19th century (Justin McDaniel).
Dimensions of original manuscript: 28.2 x 19.7 cm.

msContents.summary: Illumination cut from a folio of a Thai manuscript showing Indra listening to a sermon by Phra Malai. Phra Malai's face has been rubbed away. On the verso is text from the Phra Malai.

history.provenance: Gift of the Estate of Elizabeth Lyons, Keeper of the Asian Collections, University Museum, 1989.
